title: How
description: In a few simple steps, connect with the ideal provider for your project.

steps.title: Download the app
steps.description: Install ServiLink on your smartphone and create your account in seconds with a simple and intuitive interface.

steps.title: Describe your need
steps.description: Specify the service you need, your location and availability to get the best matches.

steps.title: Choose your provider
steps.description: Browse profiles, read reviews and select the provider that perfectly matches your expectations.

steps.title: Book and enjoy
steps.description: Confirm the booking, pay securely and enjoy the requested service without administrative hassles.
